favourite.article: Agree that it's lacking the specific praise to the Spirit, something like this: Holy Spirit, we adore Thee! Searching e'en the depths of God! Open wide our hearts art to Thee, Come Thou, fill and transform us! We adore Thee! We adore Thee! Thou our newness to impart, Unto full-grown man will bring us Glorious bride to Thee become.
We adore Thee! we adore Thee! Thee we bless, through endless days! Thank You dear Father, we praise You, love You <3

Need to add the 3rd verse! Don't leave the Spirit out of Holy Trinity! :-) "Holy Spirit, we adore thee! Paraclete and heavenly guest Sent from God and from the Savior, Thou hast led us into rest We adore Thee, we adore Thee, by thy grace forever blest We adore Thee, we adore Thee, by thy grace forever blest

I first heard this song in my local language ' Luganda" but after then I heard it in English. That's when I loved it so much. But as the days went by I included it on my best songs which satisfies my soul. Dear Christians please help me. I need to learn how to play this song on piano.
